Post.title: git
Post._content:
## Merge
git merge --abort


## commit
```
# commitbase
git merge-base $branch1 $branch2 

# commitbase
git show-branch --merge-base $branch1 $branch2 
```

## cherry-pick

- 
```
git cherry-pick <commitHash>/<branch>
```
- 
```
git cherry-pick <HashA> <HashB>
git cherry-pick A..B # A
git cherry-pick A^..B # A
```
## rebase

```sh
git rebase [startpoint] [endpoint] --onto [branchname]
```

# Ref
https://zhuanlan.zhihu.com/p/75499871
https://www.jianshu.com/p/4a8f4af4e803

tags: git,code

## Merge
git merge --abort


## commit
```
# commitbase
git merge-base $branch1 $branch2 

# commitbase
git show-branch --merge-base $branch1 $branch2 
```

## cherry-pick

- 
```
git cherry-pick <commitHash>/<branch>
```
- 
```
git cherry-pick <HashA> <HashB>
git cherry-pick A..B # A
git cherry-pick A^..B # A
```
## rebase

```sh
git rebase [startpoint] [endpoint] --onto [branchname]
```

https://zhuanlan.zhihu.com/p/75499871

Post.title: c++ 11
Post.content:
2.

c++11

(Native Concurrency)
autodeclytype
constexprPOD()

_Pragma

__VA_ARGS_

long long

  • ll (long long) %lld
  • ull (unsigned long long) %llu

limits.h
LLONG_MIN
LLONG_MAX
ULLONG_MIN

+ static_assert


noexcept

noexcept std::terminate,.

eg:

c++11noexcept(true).

2.7

C++11 = {}

,

2.8 sizeof

c++11 sizeof

2.9 friend

2.10 final/override

final.

, override,

2.11

2.12

2.13

3 ,

3.1

using.

3.2

C++11.

3.3

3.3.1
.

3.3.2

3.3.3 \

.
.

c++11 , , (xvalue, eXpiring Value), (prvalue, Pure Rvalue)

C++98

.

3.3.4 std::move

3.3.5
move_if_noexcept(x)
xnoexcept, movecopy.

3.3.6 P85

3.4

4

5

6

7

8

Post.title: arch
Post._content:
### xorg
sudo pacman -S xorg-server xorg-apps xorg-xinit xorg-xclock xterm 

### kde plasma
sudo pacman -S plasma
sudo pacman -S kde-applications

### 
sddm: simple desktop display manager

sudo pacman -S sddm
sudo systemctl enable sddm
sudo systemctl start sddm


X.
X11R6  XRelease 6


twm
TabWindow Manager for the X WindowSystem. 


sTerm, Rxvt, Konsole, Kvt, Gnome-Terminal, Nxterm, eterm



xrdp



run level [inittab](https://blog.csdn.net/newnewman80/article/details/8133797)
0 -  | shutdown.target
1 -  | rescue.target
2 - , NFS | multi-user.target
3 -  | multi-user.target
4 -  | multi-user.target
5 - X11() | graphical.target
6 -  | reboot.target


### systemd
http://blog.itpub.net/31524109/viewspace-2647049/


Display manager: https://wiki.archlinux.org/title/Display_manager_(%E7%AE%80%E4%BD%93%E4%B8%AD%E6%96%87)




dwm
https://blog.csdn.net/qq_45933858/article/details/124553077

kde

DM: https://wiki.archlinux.org/title/Display_manager_(%E7%AE%80%E4%BD%93%E4%B8%AD%E6%96%87)
DM, 
SDDM - Simple Desktop Display Manager
DM https://blog.csdn.net/weixin_36073714/article/details/116758417
WM(Window Manager)


REF:
https://www.cnblogs.com/EasonJim/p/7230616.html
https://www.jianshu.com/p/a05559a7b757
https://jtao.work/archives/x--w-i-n-d-o-w--she-zhi-jie-shao
[deepin lighdm](https://wiki.archlinux.org/title/Deepin_Desktop_Environment_(%E7%AE%80%E4%BD%93%E4%B8%AD%E6%96%87))
[Window Manager](https://wiki.archlinux.org/title/Window_manager_(%E7%AE%80%E4%BD%93%E4%B8%AD%E6%96%87))
[KDE plasma](https://wiki.archlinux.org/title/KDE_(%E7%AE%80%E4%BD%93%E4%B8%AD%E6%96%87)#%E5%90%AF%E5%8A%A8_Plasma)
